name: Wacky Yo-Ho Pirates
description:
'Ay arr, mate! Win wacky pirate races! Become a legend o' Yo-Ho Sea!

Controls:
1P:
    Accelerate/Decelerate: W/S
    Turn clockwise/Anticlockwise: D/A
    Shoot: C
2P:

    Accelerate/Decelerate: ↑/↓
    Turn clockwise/Anticlockwise: →/←
    Shoot: /

Credits:

Gameplay:
    Kacper Szkodzinski

Assets:
    Artem Kovalenko,
    Dusiek,
    Kacper Szkodzinski

Menu Backgrounds:
     vector created by upklyak - www.freepik.com

Font:

Menu Music and SFX:
    FC Pirate Music Pack by fcaudio

Gameplay Music:
    Piratez Music Pack by aHead audio
